channel.title: Dave MacKenzie
channel.description: Recent news about Dave MacKenzie, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by DigitalJournal.com (press release)
item.description:
REMINDER/Media Advisory: Government of Canada to Support Expansion of ...
WOODSTOCK, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - June 24, 2013) - Dave MacKenzie, Member of Parliament for Oxford, on behalf of the Honourable Gary Goodyear, Minister of State for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario), will announce funding to support a local manufacturer in Woodstock. MP MacKenzie will participate in a photo opportunity and will be available to answer questions from the media following the event. Please note that all details are subject to change. All times ...
